pages.text: The Titan race has incredible melee strength at a cost of poor mobility. They also have a larger mining radius, being 3x3x3 instead of 1x1x1. They are three times as large as a normal player. Due to this, they can easily trample farmland and instantly sink in water.

$(l)Default Attribute modifiers:$()$(br)300% Size$(br)$(4)-50%$() Attack Speed$(br)$(2)+50%$() Attack Damage$(br)$(2)+100%$() Health$(br)$(2)+100%$() Knockback Resistance$(br)$(2)+100%$() Reach Distance$(br)$(2)+75%$() Jump Height$(br)$(2)+1.4$() Step Height

$(l)Ability: Large Hands$()$(br)Titans are capable of mining 3x3x3 holes at a time, making them perfect for digging huge holes (especially if you want to mine entire chunks). You can bypass this by sneaking while mining. Additionally, attacking mobs will deal splash damage to surrounding mobs.
